projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Real world results
projects.description: Here are some projects I've worked on recently. Helping my clients achieve their goals.

1.title: VMS Cloud
1.description: Video monitoring product where I develop new features and maintain the application in production for 4 years.

2.title: E-Commerce Web Application
2.description: E-commerce project built with NextJS@14 to deepen my knowledge in the technology

3.title: Portfolio Website
3.description: Development of this portfolio website to showcase skills, projects and professional journey.

4.title: Video processing and conversion API with FFMPEG
4.description: I developed this API for video processing and conversion (MP4, HEVC, M3u8, FLV)

5.title: Local Connection Test
5.description: I developed my connection speed testing tool. Generates a report at the end with a link to the speed test.

6.title: Chat-room
6.description: Real-time Chat with Web Sockets simulates a Chat room. Developed to demonstrate the correct use of Web Sockets during college.

skills.title: Skills
skills.subtitle: Hard Skills
skills.description: I have a broad set of technical skills ranging from frontend development with React and TypeScript to backend with Node.js and Java. I have experience with modern frameworks, databases, and agile methodologies, always seeking development best practices.

work.title: Experience
work.subtitle: Professional
work.description: In this section, I share my

experiences.description: At Segware, I contribute significantly to the development of new features and improvement of the company's products, impacting thousands of customers. Cloud video monitoring product (VMS Cloud)

At BlockIT, a software house, I had an active and essential role in software development. I contributed significantly to the continuous improvement of existing software, ensuring an optimized experience for users. Additionally, I actively participated in the creation and implementation of innovative new projects, including ERPs, CRMs, and Landing Pages.

experiences.role: Technical Support | Python | AngularJS | Networks | Customer Service | Administrative
experiences.description: I worked as Technical Support at Intera Internet, where I was responsible for customer monitoring and technical support. Beyond technical skills, I developed my customer service capabilities and worked extensively on my soft skills. My manager provided access to the Alura platform as a benefit, which allowed me to deepen my technology knowledge by watching over 100 hours of courses during my time at the company. This experience was fundamental to my professional growth, combining practical and theoretical learning.

experiences.role: Trainee Software Developer | Java Swing - JavaFX - PHP - JQuery - Bootstrap
experiences.description: I developed an access control and monitoring system for condominium security, using Java Swing for the desktop interface and PostgreSQL to manage registrations and entry/exit records. The system generated daily reports for the security team and sent notifications via email and SMS in case of incidents. This project provided me with experience in desktop application development, database design, and programming logic.

academic.description: Throughout my Bachelor's in Software Engineering, I experienced projects with programming languages such as Java, Python, JavaScript and C++, as well as frameworks like Spring Boot, Django and React. I also gained experience with relational databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL) and non-relational (MongoDB), and version control tools like Git and all project management aspects, end-to-end, being able to work at any stage of the development process.
